entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Melfort
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melfort 2:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -27.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -33.9°C
Wind: SW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 29 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 13.
